amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-14 to require a report analyzing the impact of the bill on the safety of victims of domestic violence, domestic abuse, dating partner violence, sexual assault, and stalking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Porter.
